New Records: This marks the first instance in ODIs where India has seen three batters out of their top four dismissed without scoring.
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma was out for 0 after facing 6 balls
Ishan Kishan got out for a golden duck in his World Cup debut
Shreyas Iyer was out for 0 as he hit one straight into the hands of the cover fielder
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was also the first time both the Indian openers were dismissed for a duck since 1983 in a World Cup match
Others: Ravindra Jadeja shone with the ball, picking up 3 wickets as India bowled Australia out for 199
